definitions.definition: a building that people, usually one family, live in:
all the people living in a house:
examples: Try not to wake the whole house when you come in!

definitions.definition: a building where animals are kept:
examples: the monkey/lion house at the zoo

definitions.definition: to give a person or animal a place to live, or to provide space for something:
examples: It will be difficult to house all the refugees.
